website_summaries.verdict: Customers seeking a carbonated clay bubble mask will appreciate this cruelty-free pick.
pros: This gentle exfoliant is great for customers with sensitive skin
Charcoal formula helps remove  toxic bacteria beneath skin
Customers appreciate softness of skin after using product
cons: Some users found product itchy during use

customer_reviews.title: Foamtastic!
customer_reviews.text: Pro: Bubbles like a motha-foamer. If you've ever seen The Big Bang Theory, think of the time Sheldon filled Kripke's office with revenge foam. Yeah. Pro: Smells wonderful. Pro: Entertaining visual once mask is complete. I looked like a gray Shrek and loved every second. Pro: Great value - huge container, low price compared to more expensive, BOR-ing clay masks Con: Dries the hell out of my skin (and I have normal skin). BUT PRO: makes me get off my lazy arse and moisturize the way one should after a mask. Con: Kind of difficult to come off - must wash skin multiple times, phantom foams Just buy it, if nothing else you'll get a good giggle.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Fun mask
customer_reviews.text: Great mask! It does exactly what it says and you can feel it bubble on your face. Makes my face feel super soft afterward too. Just get it on quick or it bubbles and won't smear on nicely!
customer_reviews.author: Alysia M. Liberatore

customer_reviews.title: Good price, cruelty free, good product, slightly deceiving packaging, will purchase again
customer_reviews.text: While this mask is great and cruelty free, I was a bit put off that the jar is deceiving. While it looks like you’re getting a lot, the part where the product is, is significantly by an inch less. It seems like a waste of plastic. That being said this mask has helped keep my black heads at bay. I recommend leaving plenty of space around eyes, nose, and mouth because after 10-15 minutes the foam expands so much it gets into areas you don’t want. I got about 10 1/2 separate masks.
customer_reviews.author: brianna

customer_reviews.title: Kinda itchy and annoying
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited to try this after seeing a similar product on buzzfeed. However, it's extremely itchy and annoying while it's bubbling. I had my sister try it too, to see if I was just a weenie, but she also didn't enjoy the feeling and didn't even leave it on the full time. It's a fun product but the sensation is just too irritating for me and the results are not spectacular enough to put up with that sensation.
customer_reviews.author: TaylorTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Buy it! You won’t regret it!
customer_reviews.text: This mask is so great, it feels like you’ve dipped your face in a bowl of soda, which I may or may not have done... The mask hardens slightly before you take it off. After rinsing it off my face was baby butt smooth, tightened, lightened, and hydrated. It also comes with a little spoon to use which I didn’t find super helpful I ended up using my hands. Will definitely buy more when I run out.
customer_reviews.author: Whisper

customer_reviews.title: Bubbly Feeling So
customer_reviews.text: I know these masques are all the rage now so I wanted to give it a try and see. This masque got great reviews so I decided to give it a try. It might just be me, but the bubbly feeling it gives after a minute of application, is weird and I found it to be itchy. It was hard for me to keep it on without scratching my face. With that said, I did keep it on and have tried multiple times. I don’t see any difference in using it on my face and I really don’t like the feeling. Sorry this isn’t for me....
customer_reviews.author: Kelly E Kliolz

customer_reviews.title: Great Bubble Mask, Leaves Face Feeling Clean and Refreshed
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent bubble mask. It has the normal bubble mask smell - nothing awful and nothing perfumey. It bubbles quickly so you will want to apply it with some haste. The bubbling is strong - it feels like a thousand butterflies against your face or at least how I would imagine that to feel. It removes easily enough with warm water and a cloth (I like a muslin cloth for masks). Leaves face feeling very clean and refreshed.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Good product but harsh on my skin.
customer_reviews.text: This product leaves my skin nice and clean and a little definitely goes a long way! I really don't have any big issue with the product in itself, but I have to admit it is harsh on my skin, and I don't have sensitive skin and not allergic to the ingredients. I can't even leave it on for the recommended 5 minutes without my skin starting to burn, not tingle like it is supposed to, but burn painfully. It is okay, because as long as I don't leave it on too long the product works great; best face mask I have purchased yet. I just can't give it 5 stars because of the burning.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: What’s a fun way to get beautiful skin?
customer_reviews.text: This was a really fun product. I bought one for me & my daughter in law. We both tried it together & had a good laugh before rinsing it off. So much fun! And it was so worth it. Our skin was so baby soft after using it. We will continue to use & buy this wonderfully fun & skin enhancing product. I’m going to buy more for a fun stocking stuffer this coming Christmas. Love this product!
customer_reviews.author: eve Bean

customer_reviews.title: Six Stars!!
customer_reviews.text: This deserves 6 stars!! I have very stubborn, deep blackheads on my forehead and tons of whiteheads in between my bottom lip and chin that I can never get out even with extractors. After just one use I would say it got rid of 85-90 percent of it all and left my face smooth the rest of the day. It's a little hard to not itch but nothing crazy. I will be purchasing this again.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Hard to remove
customer_reviews.text: I found the product to be very waxy feeling post foaming, and the residue left behind was very difficult to remove. The downing was so expansive that it easily spreads to the eye area even when applied at a reasonable distance away.
customer_reviews.author: BENinATL

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good!
customer_reviews.text: I have normal-to-oily skin, and I use cleansing masks to remove oil from the pores in my T-zone. After one use, I'm impressed! This mask started working within 60 seconds, and left my face squeaky-clean (but not dried out) in under 10 minutes. It also feels like this mask really sank into my pores, because it takes a bit of work to wash off. Like I said, I've only used it once, but based on what I've seen I'm impressed and would recommend this mask to others.
customer_reviews.author: M D

customer_reviews.title: Love it. I am a man with wife and ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it. I am a man with wife and kids, so things can get stressfull. Luckily, my face won’t age as quickly. I find that using my fingers to apply the clay is a little less cumbersome than the applicator. You also save product that way as a little layer goes a long way. Very cool, fun product to use on my face, especially after shaving. Be sure to use lotion after!
customer_reviews.author: boniverismyhero

customer_reviews.title: this mask is really fun to put on
customer_reviews.text: First of all, this mask is really fun to put on. It gets really foamy and is generally hilarious. It works quite well, I feel that my face is much softer after i use it. The only reason I knock off a star is that it is a little irritating to my sensitive skin. Not so much that I can't use it, but you get an irritating itchy feeling about half way through the time you need to leave it on.
customer_reviews.author: r14

customer_reviews.title: Makes you look like a puffy grey cloud 😍
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this! One of my absolute favorite new face masks. It doesn’t feel gross and sticky going on like a lot of other masks do, and you get to watch it bubble up on your face. You look like a rain cloud. I love it. And washing it off, your face feels suuuper smooth. The smell is...not unpleasant, but not perfumed either. I would recommend getting a mask brush though, because otherwise it’s a little difficult to get on evenly.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Guerrero

customer_reviews.title: Different
customer_reviews.text: Me and my daughter tried this on Christmas Eve ,it was a weird and different experience, I could only leave mine on a few minutes because it started to itch ,but not from a reaction but I think just from it bubbling lol don't get it close to your nose or it will go up there
customer_reviews.author: Tammy R.

customer_reviews.title: WOW!
customer_reviews.text: This deserves all the stars. This stuff is GREAT. Didn’t know what to expect... Left it on for 10 minutes like it said (5-10 min.) . MY face feels SSSSSOOOOO SOFT!!! Definitely refreshing. Skin feels great. Worth it. 👍
customer_reviews.author: Martinez Family

customer_reviews.title: Too itchy to leave on
customer_reviews.text: Foams up extremely well...if you can stand the itching sensation. Skin looked clean after. Too itchy, though. Perhaps I will use it more on décolletage more than on my face. Or if I do continue to use it, I just wont do my whole face, because it drives me nuts.
customer_reviews.author: N. M.

customer_reviews.title: Sensitive Skin Be Careful!
customer_reviews.text: This product was definitely fun to watch bubble and foam on the face...I started to look like a chipmunk! It tingled and burned slightly, from reviews I read I assumed this meant it was working. It took some time to rinse off, very slippery. But the next few days my skin became red, irritated, dry and itchy. I now have dry flaky skin all over my face that is painful, something I have never had before
customer_reviews.author: Olivia Merrill

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love this! If you can get past the two minute mark, where it really starts bubbling and foaming, you're good to go. I am extremely ticklish and with some squirming managed to do that. The spatula is a little small but workable. The best part was when I washed it off...my pores haven't looked this good since I was 12. My skin isn't very sensitive but I am very pale. By the time I got out of the shower any redness was gone The smell isn't unpleasant or overpowering but it does take some direct under the shower head water to get it completely off. Love it and will buy again
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Broken cap but worth it.
customer_reviews.text: The face mask works amazingly. Besides the cap being broken and half of the mask stuff I could not use, I would buy again if in a better container.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: This mask was so fun!!! It made my skin feel amazing!!! I hate touching my face but I couldn't stop after using this mask! My skin was super smooth, without that super tight feeling that some masks leave you with. And it definitely foams up but it's not overwhelming where the foam is dripping off your face or anything, which sounds like a weird thing to mention, but I've tried other bubble masks where you can't sit and relax because they have that problem. Super happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: Brittwavey

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: I am LOVING this bubble mask. Takes a few times to get used to the effervescent sensation it creates (do this mask during chores/tasks around the house vs. sitting on the couch, it will keep you distracted from it and keep you from feeling the need to scratch!) but I'm noticing a lovely change in skin texture from just once a week. The scent is also amaaaazing on this.
customer_reviews.author: Kelley Greeley

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: It was so cool!! The thicker the layer, the longer it takes to foam up and, the thicker the foam. It a blast to do at a girls night in!!! And our skin was soft after!
customer_reviews.author: Chan

customer_reviews.title: love this mask, makes a great gift
customer_reviews.text: I love this mask and have given it as a gift to a friend who also loves it. It tickles a little when it bubbles and if you put it too close to your eyes, the mask bubbles up and will get in your lashes. My face feels clean and skin is smooth after using this mask.
customer_reviews.author: Kor

customer_reviews.title: Great product even for super sensitive skin!
customer_reviews.text: I have extremely sensitive skin and many allergies to common ingredients in skin products. I took a chance with this and wasn’t disappointed. It didn’t burn or dry my skin out. There was no redness or reaction. Definitely a good buy. And you look hilarious when it poofs up 😂😂😂😂
customer_reviews.author: Sara Kindley

customer_reviews.title: Bubbles in my clay
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves this product. She said it works fantastically. My issue is it looks scary on her. I run when I see her putting it on.
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: Fun to use
customer_reviews.text: It was open when I received it, lid wasn't on properly but wasn't dried out, just around the lid. Really wasn't anything special. Fun to use, bubbled up right away so it was hard to spread. Didn't think it really cleaned my skin but my skin was very soft after. Don't think I'd buy again or recommend
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: A cool experience. I will definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.text: This stuff feels so weird! But in a good way. It’s hard to describe the feeling. Hundreds of little bubbles tingling your face. It’s hard to sit still because it tickles. It takes some effort to wash it off, but my face feels amazing afterwards. Soft, not greasy, refreshed. This was better than I expected it to be.
customer_reviews.author: fenstege

customer_reviews.title: Great mask, great price,  great product!
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to try this mask after reading all of the great reviews! The texture of the mask is neat when you first touch it. It goes on easily and comes with a neat little spreading tool. The mask feels great on. You need to get a wash cloth or take a shower to get it off. It was a little stubborn coming off, but worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Hollyann

customer_reviews.title: but it sure is fun to see it foam up on your face
customer_reviews.text: Does not get rid of all your blackheads. I still have to extract it after, but it sure is fun to see it foam up on your face. My skin does feel soft afterwards. It is just hard to wash off. I always make sure the water is really hot, otherwise it takes long come off
customer_reviews.author: Lily

customer_reviews.title: What a great product
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful product. I loved the foaming. My pores looked smaller the second time I used it so it definitely works. I will buy this again. I will also recommend that my friends buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Saintmom

customer_reviews.title: Prepare to itch!
customer_reviews.text: It definitely is a foaming cream but this reallllyy tests your patience and what not. Once it foamed, there were areas where it was "popping" and tingling which caused the incredibly urge to itch! I could hardly get through five minutes before having to wash it off because I couldn't stand it anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This is a fun mask. I like the way it foams up. Once washed off my skin felt and looked great. Easy to use and the container is great too.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Bubbles and tickles and a clean face!
customer_reviews.text: This works great with men and women. My skin feels great. Bubbles tickle but it’s good stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Jason A. Wade

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I don't write reviews but I am for this. This was wonderful. Could tell a difference and it almost tickled as it foamed. I have sensitive skin and this did not bother me.
customer_reviews.author: A. Armer

customer_reviews.title: Can cause burning
customer_reviews.text: This product starts to burn after a minute or so. I thought it might be I was allergic and had a friend try it and it started burning her face as well. So I’m an effort to not give up I had my daughter try it and it did take a little longer before she started to feel uncomfortable and felt a burning sensation
customer_reviews.author: Lorena Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Got this product and couldnt wait to use it! I was not disappointed :) was such a great buy!!! It foamed up sooo much and i felt all the little foam bubbles all over my face. I cant wait to use it again!!...only complaint is the tool they give u to apply is soooo small...however my face was so smooth and fresh after :)
customer_reviews.author: jessica allen

customer_reviews.title: New motherfoamin favorite
customer_reviews.text: I loooove bubble masks. I bought this one mostly for novelty as the name and image are awesome but seriously this is my new fav. I have sensitive skin and it does start to get somewhat itchy\annoying feeling after about 3 minutes but I almost kinda like it and it doesn't have any negative effect on my skin, no redness or breaking out. My 15 year old daughter loves it too.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Lovely

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's fun but I don't feel like it really does anything to clean out my pores.
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlin Fogel

customer_reviews.title: It's okay
customer_reviews.text: Not the best bubble mask but it'll do. This mask is minimal at best. It won't leave a glow or get deep in the pores. You'll most likely need to exfoliate afterwards to really empty pores and look fresh. I wouldn't buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Sara M

customer_reviews.title: Easy and fun to use
customer_reviews.text: Easy and fun to use. However, even after multiple uses, I cannot see a difference in my skin. Will continue to use because it's fun, but will not repurchase.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Baxter

customer_reviews.title: Super fun!
customer_reviews.text: I love this mask! It feels good and is a fun way to spice up your face routine! My boyfriend and I had a few good laughs :)
customer_reviews.author: megan

customer_reviews.title: Cleans and minimizes pores
customer_reviews.text: Great product that really does clean your pores and leaves your skin feeling refreshed.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Luther

customer_reviews.title: if you want a nice clean experience for your face this is the product
customer_reviews.text: if you want a nice clean experience for your face this is the product.. it works great after a day out in the sun or just to have a nice mini spa time for your face.. its pretty neat how it works ..
customer_reviews.author: Georgiana E Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Order this now!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this mask!!! My kids and I tried it as soon as we got it and it's so fun!!! It made my face feel sooooo clean. I always have clogged pores and usually masks dry me out, but this one made my skin feel tight, but not parched! I definitely recommend this. Not to mention the branding is amazeballs!!! Love the package!
customer_reviews.author: stylinmomma

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is the bomb!!! Made my face totally soft and clean.
customer_reviews.author: angel

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. Very well packaged
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Very well packaged. Delivered right to my door. Used it on my chin to begin with just to make sure there's no allergic reaction or anything; face feels soft and clean.
customer_reviews.author: BabyCakez🌸

customer_reviews.title: Cool Packaging .. No Benefit to skin
customer_reviews.text: I really didn’t see any difference in my skin using this but it was cool packaging and a funny experience
customer_reviews.author: Simae Rose

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Feels funny at first but love how soft it made my face and I revived it in a day with standard shipping. Stoked about this mask!!
customer_reviews.author: m.stone

customer_reviews.title: I really love this face mask
customer_reviews.text: I really love this face mask! It immediately starts to carbonate, so work fast. Put all of your hair out of the way, because the texture of this mask isn't like a foam. Once it makes contact with skin or hair- it's thick, sticky and creamy. You can really feel the effects of the mask on your skin. It tickles/itches a lot. When I take it off I can tell the oil (and I have a considerably extra amount of sebum in my skin) has been taken out. My face is tighter and brighter. Definitely need another purchase from the Elizabeth Mott collection. ♡
customer_reviews.author: Peyton Gannon

customer_reviews.title: Fun Product
customer_reviews.text: Face felt very clean after and it was a fun novelty. It was a little difficult to rinse off though.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Arthur

customer_reviews.title: Fun bubbly mask
customer_reviews.text: I enjoyed how this mask bubbled. It did feel like it was clearing the dirt and oil from my pores. My skin felt soft but a little dry after using it. It doesn’t take a lot to cover the face.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun for the whole family! :)
customer_reviews.text: I cracked UP as I let my 17 y/o & friend be my Guinea pigs for this mask! Their faces bubbled so hideously because they used too much! For me that was a note to self: don't use too much! I didn't and was very pleased .
customer_reviews.author: kim somewhere in StL

customer_reviews.title: Bubbly fun cleansing mask
customer_reviews.text: This is definitely a flaming face cleanser! It’s a clay texture and immediately turns foamy once applied to skin. The application tool is fine but can be hard to apply the cleanser with. I just use it to scoop out the cleanser and then rub it on my face with my fingertips. It can be drying so definitely apply a moisturizer afterwards. But it is a product I would use again!
customer_reviews.author: StudentForLife#graduated

customer_reviews.title: It's the best!
customer_reviews.text: Okay this stuff is hands down awesome! My face has never felt better!!! I am in love with this product!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Segura

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as expected. Also gentle enough to use everyday. I love it. Helps control oily face and blackheads.
customer_reviews.author: Mackenzie Collins

customer_reviews.title: Fun to foam
customer_reviews.text: So fun to use; has a slight toning effect but mostly just fun same function as other clay masks
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ok
customer_reviews.text: Feels nice when you apply but didn't notice any changes after...
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Amanda

customer_reviews.title: A vacuum cleaner for your skin!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this so much! It's so fun, but it really works at removing or minimizing any problems on my skin. It's a bit hard to take off because it's kind of soapy, but its not a huge problem for me. I absolutely love this so much!!
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey R.

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: I usually have easily breakout skin but this does not break out my skin There is quite a bit of product in here as well
customer_reviews.author: Zuzanna

customer_reviews.title: Crystal clear and super soft skin!!!
customer_reviews.text: It didn’t bubble as much as I would’ve liked it to as shown in other reviewers photos, but it’s still fun to use. Most importantly, it leaves my skin crystal clear and super soft!
customer_reviews.author: Miki

customer_reviews.title: Bubbletastic!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this product! I love feeling it bubble on my face because it feels like it’s detoxifying my face. My husband hates the bubbly sensation so he doesn’t leave it on long. All in all it makes me face feel nice and soft afterwards!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: smells so nice!!
customer_reviews.text: smells so nice!!! bubbles up a lot! love it! make sure to leave some room around your mouth, eyes and nose due to bubbles. my husband thinks it's funny and says i look like i'm molding but this stuff is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: amazonloverfromtn

customer_reviews.title: Very fun!
customer_reviews.text: I love this mask. I have never tried a bubbly mask but it was very fun. It made my skin feel very soft.I will definitely repurchase!
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: GET THIS MASK NOW!!!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE LOVE LOVE this mask! Not a bad price and a great thing to add to your weekly routine!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice product!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my sister and she loves it, uses it frequently. Does help with redness and cleanses skin nicely.
customer_reviews.author: shopping Alex

customer_reviews.title: Pores? What pores?
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is kinda fun! I enjoyed the bubbly sensation on my face, and my daughter thought it looked hilarious when it was all bubbled out. After I washed it off, I was surprised... where did my pores go?
customer_reviews.author: Emiley Thacker

customer_reviews.title: This mask is amazing! It is bubbly and goopy
customer_reviews.text: This mask is amazing! It is bubbly and goopy, and foams up after application. Results are fabulous for me; it's cleared up my complexion and acts like a facial peel, almost. Follow it up with a good moisturizer and call it a day.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for gift giving.
customer_reviews.text: This was a cute gift for a friend. It works really well, and is a fun "girl's night" item.
customer_reviews.author: Vwelyn

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: I love how soft my skin feels after using this! Not to mention, it looks absolutely hilarious when it bubbles.
customer_reviews.author: Leah S.

customer_reviews.title: Fun mask
customer_reviews.text: So much fun and makes your skin so soft and clean looking
customer_reviews.author: vermillionprose

customer_reviews.title: Like a carpet shampooer for your face!
customer_reviews.text: I had some pretty gnarly blackheads in my T-zone. Only takes ten minutes and softens and smoothed your skin without abrasive scrubbing, in 10 minutes! Everyone has 10 minutes! Great buy! Will order again.
customer_reviews.author: SolarasMomma2017

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Get so many uses out of this thing! A much better deal than many of the single sheet masks you can find at stores and also great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Laiba Khaliq

customer_reviews.title: Fun stuff!
customer_reviews.text: This mask is so much fun! My skin felt great afterwards. Just be prepared to want to itch your face while it's on. I was a little disappointed that some of the clay leaked out of the top of the container before I even opened it, so maybe be weary if you are buying this as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It starts to burn let me tell you lol my ...
customer_reviews.text: It starts to burn let me tell you lol my skin is sensitive so I think that’s what it probably was
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Stokes

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: This mask is amazing! Works in seconds, you can feel it cleaning your pores out and leaves your skin looking and feeling so soft.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works wonderful takes the oil right off your face if your ...
customer_reviews.text: Works wonderful takes the oil right off your face if your suffering with acne this is your answer
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very good though feels like it helps a bit with my ...
customer_reviews.text: Leaves face very soft and kind of have to apply it fast cause once its on it slowly starts to foam. Very good though feels like it helps a bit with my acne, and I cant find nearly anything to help with my acne. Definetly buy it well worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Fabulous
customer_reviews.text: Yes, yes, yes, and YES, this is the most wonderful clay mask EVER! It may not be the cheapest in the world and you might be scared to take a chance, facial product junkies, DO IT!
customer_reviews.author: Lyn Rivera

customer_reviews.title: A must!!
customer_reviews.text: Love it!! You can feel it working!! My skin felt soft and you get a good laugh as you see it working lol
customer_reviews.author: Liliana Dorantes-Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Good clean fun
customer_reviews.text: Loved this mask, makes my skin feel great and it’s super fun!
customer_reviews.author: Marvin Carbo

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: My face feels so soft, tight and clean after use! I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Christina Sermos

customer_reviews.title: Great mask
customer_reviews.text: Works great, bubbles super fast so make sure you put one quick.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Bubbly excellece
customer_reviews.text: Looks like a clay mask as it goes on, but bubbles up and feels great. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: FramFram Minnesotan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Makes my face feel and look great, plus it's a fun take on masks.
customer_reviews.author: xjoshi

customer_reviews.title: Safe sealed
customer_reviews.text: Came with protective seals which made me happy, comes with a tiny application knife. Weird ass texture though, smells pretty good
customer_reviews.author: Kaley Wagner

customer_reviews.title: It grows the longer you wear it
customer_reviews.text: Feels tingly when it's on, and skin feels great after. It made me look like one of the rock trolls from Frozen. A bit messy washing it off.
customer_reviews.author: McCord

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: SO sad I ran out of this. This is SO FUN!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It just helps bubble aND relax u like the days I playing in the bath as a ...
customer_reviews.text: I feel fresh and shiny after using this product. It doesn't damage or pull anything away with a harsh feel. It just helps bubble aND relax u like the days I playing in the bath as a kid. Then washing away to a smooth and glowing youthful you. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Q

customer_reviews.title: Burnt my skin
customer_reviews.text: Could just me be... but this burnt my skin. I had to sleep with an ice pack and had visible red marks for days. Test a patch first!
customer_reviews.author: Casey E Lee

customer_reviews.title: Great mask!
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff. My skin is so soft after using it. It never caused me to breakout either.
customer_reviews.author: G & J

customer_reviews.title: So many bubbles!
customer_reviews.text: I love this mask. It is fun and oh so bubbly. It makes my skin feel so clean afterwards.
customer_reviews.author: Morgen

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Gift to my daughter! She loved the name and even more she loved the product!
customer_reviews.author: Angie Gibson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: most amazing bubble mask I've used! really bubbles up on your face!
customer_reviews.author: sdlapp

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Works just like I expected! Be prepared for it to itch and tickle from the bubbles, but it left my skin feeling soft and clean!
customer_reviews.author: Alison Gardino

customer_reviews.title: Not one bubble!! DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.text: Extremely disappointed!!! Applied as directed, not even one bubble! Not one! If I wanted just a clay mask I would’ve used one of the many clay masks I already have..
customer_reviews.author: Robin McClure

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Love this product my face always feels amazing after using. Really great in removing black heads
customer_reviews.author: misty morey

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The bubbling effect really makes you think it's doing something
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Spivey

customer_reviews.title: This product is a must try!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this magical product. Zaps big pores and leaves skin feeling fresh.
customer_reviews.author: Shauna WInston

product_meta.title: Carbonated Bubble Clay Mask (Cruelty Free) One Bad Motha'foamer bubble mask By Elizabeth Mott Net Wt. 100g / 3.53oz
product_meta.description: This bubble mask is serious detox for your face, with a bubbly chaser. Natural clay and activated charcoal deeply penetrate your pores to draw out impurities, while carbonated bubbles effervesce into a lightweight foam that clings to your skin. Goodbye tight pinching of traditional clay masks, hello comfortable! Plus there’s no gloppy drips, so you can go about your biz without it sliding off your face and onto your phone. One Bad Motha’foamer deep-cleans pores and smooths out dry, patchy skin for a soft, glowing complexion. It works hard on behalf of your gorgeous face. Net weight: 100 g / 3.53 oz
feature_bullets: ENJOY SOFTER, SMOOTHER SKIN - Our bubble mask uses natural white kaolin clay gently exfoliates your skin, stimulating circulation as it helps cleanse your face.
CLEANSING DETOX - Charcoal in the bubble mask detoxifies beneath your skin’s surface, removing icky impurities such as dirt and bacteria.
DEEP-CLEAN YOUR PORES - Unlike ordinary bubble masks, our clay is specially infused with CO2, for a bubbly milky scrub that’s effective yet gentle on skin.
EASY TO USE--AND FUN! - Simply apply the bubble mask and watch it foam up into millions of tiny, dirt-fighting bubbles. Rinse off and love the way your skin looks and feels!
CRUELTY FREE - Elizabeth Mott is a cruelty-free brand (Registered in PETA's Beauty Without Bunnies program)
